spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate. Majority of wall alignments and room placements match the 2D plan. Door in Toilet-1 is reversed in swing direction. Window in the bedroom is slightly wider than original spec.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms (Kitchen, Utility, Toilet, Living, Bedroom, Balcony) are present and correctly adjacent. Door frames are well-embedded, though the utility door is simplified compared to the plan's opening.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture including the specific rug, sofa arrangement, and round dining table. Scale is consistent with floor area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering. Lighting is soft and realistic. Geometry is clean with no visible artifacts or clipping.

detected_errors.description: Toilet-1 door swing orientation is mirrored relative to the architectural plan.
Bedroom window/balcony sliding door width is slightly overstated compared to the 2D footprint.
The utility room appliances are slightly rearranged compared to the specific icons in the 2D plan.
